name: Auto Away: Automatic Away
author: Szymon Stefanek
desc: Automatically enters away state after a period of inactivity

desc: Provides toolbar buttons for several commonly used channel operations

author: g00dsP33D
desc: Shows Statistics for a joined channel

name: Hell Country

desc: A simple script to know where a host come from

author: g00dsP33D
desc: Automatically enters cryption-data for your crypted objects

name: Ezbounce
author: Szymon Stefanek
desc: Provides shortcuts and toolbar buttons for EZBounce IRC proxy commands

author: Grifisx & Noldor
desc: A simple one-o-one game

author: assassin
desc: A simple F-Server

author: Grifisx & HelLViS69
desc: A simple script for lol and kiss with F3-F8 keys and for funny writing

author: HelLViS69

name: Mines Weeper
author: Szymon Stefanek
desc: A nice "time eater"

author: Szymon Stefanek
desc: Displays RSS news feeds from various sources

author: Szymon Stefanek
desc: Allows advertising and eventually sharing the currently played media on IRC channels and queries

author: Grifisx & Noldor

author: Szymon Stefanek and HelLViS69

author: Grifisx & Noldor

author: Grifisx
desc: It allows the user to warn, kick, and ban who says forbidden words

name: Twins Auto Op: auto op/voice/ban
author: Ahinu
desc: An auto op/voice/ban system for your channels (addon from the Twins script)

name: Twins Input Color: Colorize your input text
author: Ahinu
desc: Colorizes your input text in channel, queries and DCC chats (addon from the Twins script)

name: Twins Lag bar: A graphical lag bar
author: Ahinu
desc: A simple lag bar with three different colors (addon from the Twins script)

name: Twins Media Player: Control your player and share you music
author: Ahinu
desc: Remote control your media player with a simple user interface, and offer your music to other users (addon from the Twins script)

name: Host Check
desc: Check previous host of an user

name: KISS: The KVIrc Icons Style Setup
author: HelLViS69
desc: Simple icons sets changer. You can choose old icons, new icons with old smiles or new icons
